title: Fuck the facts pack - www.metal-legions.com
description:
I love brutal women who know how to express aggresions :D And this one does that really good.

[quote]Fuck the Facts (FTF) was originally a recording project constructed by Topon Das in 1997, though nameless and inactive until 1999. After many early recordings, including split tapes with cybergore project S.M.E.S. and Polish death metal band Mastectomia, Fuck the Facts began developing a name in the underground with grindcore and noise fans. In 2000, the first full-length CD-R, Discoing the Dead, was recorded. The positive feedback led to Topon assembling a full band to continue with the project in 2001.
Fuck the Facts took its name from the title of a Naked City song. 
"Bastardized grindcore" is a term coined by the band to self-describe their sound. 
[/quote]


Pack includes - 
Split with S.M.E.S.
Bastardising Canada 2002 tour
Backstabber Ettiquette
Discoing the dead (remastered)
Split with Feeble minded 
Split with Silvester stalline
Split with No refund and Mermaid in a manhole "Great one" (three way split)
Split with Sergent slaughter
Legacy of hopelesness
Mullet fever (remastered)
Collection of Splits
Split with Pleasant valley
Split with Mesrine
Stigmata High-five

Various bitrates, and thanks to the original uploader :)
